title: AccuWeather brings back Dark Sky’s hyperlocal weather alerts, puts temperature icon in paywall
content:
Following Apple’s purchase and subsequent murder of Dark Sky for Android, the best weather app on the platform, AccuWeather stepped up to fill the gap with hyperlocal forecasts and a pleasant overall design. Now, AccuWeather has some good news and some bad news. AccuWeather has a new option to get hyperlocal weather notifications, but it’s also locked a basic feature behind a paywall.

more…

The post AccuWeather brings back Dark Sky’s hyperlocal weather alerts, puts temperature icon in paywall appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The AccuWeather app for Android is rolling out a new "Premium+" subscription that adds new hyperlocal weather notifications and more.
